Html:
i want to read a __.ra,.rm __file using naudio. If this is not possible then can you lead me any idea to convert .ra, .rm file into mp3/wav/wma file using C#.

Like using lameexe we can convert wav file into mp3.

And my 2nd question is about setting bass for different audio/s while mixing sounds. Like we can set volume for sounds while mixing. Like set rate of beat/bass from Graphic Equalizer.

For Any Help
Thanx

Sorry, ra and rm are not open formats, and NAudio has no built-in support for them. I'd look for a command-line tool that converts it to WAV.

And yes you can use a BiQUad filter for adjusting bass. Look in the WPF project at the example graphic equalizer source code to pick up some ideas on how to do this.

Mark
